description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=2/3. Single Player 2D Bullet Hell Shooter. Try to destroy your opponent's ship by firing a barrage of bullets and depleting its various shields. Dodge your enemy's insane attacks while using various Power Ups to improve your odds.
description.short: Single Player 2D Bullet Hell Shooter. Try to destroy your opponent's ship by firing a barrage of bullets and depleting its various shields. Dodge your enemy's insane attacks while using various Power Ups to improve your odds.
